MajorClaims.Text: alternative means of transportation and international laws in controlling automobiles should be introduced
alternative forms of transport and international laws on controlling automobiles are necessary due to the environmental protection and the alleviation of traffic congestion

Claims.Text: some people claim the convenience of automobile
it is crucial to alter automobiles to the other means of transportation and to legislate to control automobiles
the methods to reduce the number of automobiles and to control car ownership and use should be immediately planned and implemented
alternative forms of transportation and international laws to control automobiles ownership and use can work effectively

Premises.Text: an increase in the number of automobiles brings about environmental pollution
automobile exhaust and carbon dioxides emission have bad impacts on the air
the air gets to be polluted and it causes respiratory disease of the local inhabitants
an increase in the number of automobiles causes terrible traffic congestion
Once we get into the traffic jam, it forces us to waste our time for a while
traffic congestion irritates drivers and as a result, it leads to an increase of traffic accidents
alternative forms which emit less carbon dioxides and gasses than automobiles are ideal
rental bicycle system has been introduced in several European countries
This system is that at the corner of each district, the rental bicycles are placed and the people can ride it to the other districts with a small fee
bicycle expels neither carbon dioxides nor harmful gasses
it is a better form to protect environment than automobile
these attempts to reduce automobiles can ease traffic congestion and environmental pollution
the introduction of international laws can be also effective
there are some regulations to limit the use of automobiles by time and to allow the people possess one car only
